TopicTitle: Transfering Craft files from the past?

Articles.Content: I know HOW to. This is about updates. Anything with the new update that would render any craft from older versions useless?
Are you talking pre-0.25 craft? I can't promise anything before 0.25 coming out ok (assuming it loads at all), but after that it should be fine.

I'm currently 1.0.2. Nah just current, my older Saturn V can't fly because the "Rhino Engines" were nerfed down. Also weren't the old Mk 3 stuff removed then?

Boy I wish they would do that to Russians is War Thunder.

Old Mk2 was redone at 0.25, I think the Mk3 overhaul was 0.9.

Also nice to see someone who knows the pain of being Soviet fodder.

Nothing that's been announced yet should render your .craft files broken. I've not seen any announcements on par with the major plane part reworks, which did cause some havok on existing craft. I've also not heard anything about aero or engine rebalance, aside from adding the new ones. But all that still remains up in the air...

Cheers,

~Claw
